name: 4x4 (itch)
description:
My entry to #LowRezJam

This game is similar to Warioware games because of its use of randomized minigames, which there are four of them in this game, making it the reason for the name of this game. This game took the shortest to complete out of all the other games that I've made, which is two days.

Music created by: DST (Deceased Superior Technician)

Sound effects created by: Me (created using Chiptone and SFXR)
